column2: Vinton Job Notification Dated : 02.05.2024 JOB VACANCY  Civil / Mechanical Engineer - Business Development We're actively seeking a Civil / Mechanical Engineer - Business Development to join our dynamic team. We require an individual adept in business development, with a demonstrated track record of securing new projects monthly on a consistent basis. As a crucial member of our team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our projects and contributing to our continued growth. In this role, your primary responsibilities will encompass project development, team management, task coordination, budget finalization, and the consistent acquisition of new projects each month. The key to success in this position lies in your solid background in project coordination, effective management skills, technical proficiency, and the ability to cultivate strong client relationships. We value excellence in communication, presentation, project bidding, and final negotiation skills. If you are results-driven and share a genuine passion for the intricate world of architectural metalwork, we warmly welcome you to be part of our team and contribute to our journey of innovation and success. Job Specifications and Key Attributes of the Candidate 1 Age Group 28 - 40 Years 2 Gender - Male 3 Qualifications - Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field. 4 Experience - 3 to 5 years of Experience in a reputed civil/mechanical industry with expertise in Project Management  5 Salary Package - Rs.25,000/- to 33,000/- approx. per month, based on the above qualifications and proven competence  6 Position Reporting to Manager - Sales & Marketing 7 Location - South Chittoor, Ernakulam, Kochi, Near Aster Medcity. 8 Joining Time 30 days from the date of the offer letter 9 Share Resumes with experience credentials to Email :  hr@vinton.in   Whatsapp : +91- 9995432522 If you are an ambitious and detail-oriented professional with a passion for successful project delivery, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Deliverables Project Bidding : Prepare and submit competitive project bids, utilizing market research and industry knowledge to maximize project grabbing. Budget Finalization : Collaborate with the finance department to finalize project budgets, ensuring accurate cost estimates and profitability. New Project Acquisition : Proactively seek and secure new architectural metalwork projects on a monthly basis, demonstrating a consistent track record of business development. Client Relations : Cultivate and maintain strong client relationships, ensuring client satisfaction and repeat business. Communication and Presentation : Communicate effectively with both internal teams and external clients, including delivering compelling presentations and proposals. Project Development : Lead the development of architectural metalwork projects, from initial concept to final execution, ensuring they meet client requirements and quality standards. Final Negotiation : Negotiate project terms and contracts with clients to achieve mutually beneficial agreements. Team Management : Oversee a team of professionals involved in project execution, providing guidance, support, and direction to ensure projects are completed on time and within budget. Task Coordination : Efficiently coordinate tasks and resources to optimize project workflow and productivity. Skill Sets Business Development Skills : Proven ability to consistently secure new architectural metal project's Project Coordination : Solid background in coordinating complex projects from inception to completion. Management Experience : Previous experience in managing teams and resources effectively. Technical Proficiency : Strong technical knowledge related to architectural metalwork projects. Client Relations : Excellent interpersonal skills and a track record of maintaining strong client relationships. Communication : Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, and the ability to deliver compelling presentations. Negotiation Skills : Proficiency in negotiation to achieve favourable project terms. Passion for Architectural Metalwork : A genuine passion for the architectural metalwork industry and a results-driven mindset. Overall, the Civil / Mechanical Engineer - Business Development role you're offering requires a well-rounded skill set, including business acumen, technical expertise, project management capabilities, and strong interpersonal skills. Candidates with a successful track record in securing unique metalwork projects and a genuine enthusiasm for the industry would be ideal for this position. ____________________________________________________________________________ NOTE:  The job specifications, Key Result Areas and/or Deliverables mentioned in this Notification are indicative and are subject to change at any time at the sole discretion of the Management or as warranted by exigencies of service.

column2: As an ROV Pilot, your primary responsibility is to operate remotely operated vehicles (ROVs) in various underwater environments. You will be tasked with performing complex maneuvers, conducting inspections, and executing tasks as directed by project managers or clients. Your role will involve both technical proficiency in operating ROV systems and effective communication with the onshore team to ensure successful completion of missions.        Key Responsibilities:          ROV Operation: Operate ROV systems in accordance with project requirements, including maneuvering, navigation, and control of manipulator arms and other tools.      Inspection and Maintenance: Conduct pre-dive checks, routine maintenance, and troubleshooting of ROV equipment to ensure optimal performance and safety.      Data Collection: Utilize onboard cameras, sensors, and other equipment to collect high-quality data during underwater operations, ensuring accuracy and completeness of information.      Communication: Maintain clear and effective communication with surface personnel, project managers, and other team members to relay operational status, report any issues, and coordinate tasks.      Safety Compliance: Adhere to safety protocols and procedures at all times, including compliance with industry regulations and company policies to ensure a safe working environment.      Documentation: Record operational data, equipment status, and mission details accurately in logs and reports for analysis and future reference.      Training and Development: Stay updated on advances in ROV technology and participate in training programs to enhance skills and knowledge related to ROV operations.

column2: We are in the process of identifying a suitable candidate for the role of Application Engineer for Automotive/Industrial Seals Business        The industry segment encompasses Passenger Vehicles, Commercial Vehicles, Tractors and Industrial applications      This position is based in Pune and will report to the Head of Application Engineering              The Application Engineer is responsible for defining the technical needs of our customers and translating them into an SKF product and service offering      Working closely with Sales and Customer Service, they help generate profitable business through engineering solutions to customer needs      They manage and lead technical partnership with customers, identifying opportunities, responding to inquiries, handling complaints, evaluating, and mitigating technical risks                              Job Responsibilities                                  Independently lead and grow business engagement with OEM/Tier-1 Engineering and sourcing teams acting as customer single point of contact for seals.                              Actively identify and pursue new business opportunities by understanding customer concerns and evolving market needs.                              Identify and analyse the customer technical requirements and communicate the parameters clearly and accurately to the SKF engineering value chain.                              Facilitate and drive engineering activities as per SKF ETO process from the start of business opportunity until end of production, including specification phase, prototype phase, industrialization phase, series production phase and warranty phase.                              Create application engineering proposals and customized solutions according to customer requirements and present to customer in a clear and effective manner.                              Work in coordination with SKF product design and product engineering teams to facilitate DFMEA and discuss the same with customer on a specific project or product line.                              Promote and emphasize first-time quality by offering critical assessment of product or processes and employ continuous improvement activities such as lessons learned, warranty analysis, etc.                              Participate in the execution of Root Cause Analysis of the customers application issues and contribute to the issue resolution.                              Represent SKF to our customers and institutions through visits, presentations, seminars, and industry events.                              To follow management instructions and procedures; to report Environment Health and Safety (EHS) risks and EHS related incidents; to follow quality specifications and requirements, and identify quality risks and opportunities for improvement.                                                  Job Metrics                                  Number of SORs, RFQs                              Sales Velocity                              ETO Milestone adherence                              Operating Margin                              Warranty Failures                                  Candidate Profile                                  University Master s or Bachelor s degree in Mechanical Engineering with 6 - 8 years relevant work experience in Sealing products and applications.                              Dependable, reliable, and self-motivated. Excellent communication skills.                              Working knowledge of material selection, metal stampings, rubber process technology and design of seals in typical automotive and industrial applications.                              Indepth Knowledge of industrial seals with an ability to interpret customer functional specifications and convert them into product designs.                              Project Management skills with proven ability to manage multiple concurrent projects.

column2: Job Profile: The Systems Engineer (SE) will build Amagi solutions for the global team of systems engineers as part of customer proof of concepts and new release testing. The SE will be responsible for automating manual tasks and solutions that will bring efficiency to the existing workflows. The SE will be engaged when more complex, custom integrations with customer solutions are required. The SE will be the interface between the customer and the product team leading product discussions, feature requests, and building proof of concept for customers. The SE will build and maintain product demos, technical presentations, and other technical collateral necessary in various stages of the sales cycle. The SE will support the sales team in account planning and opportunity sales cycle by taking technical ownership of the opportunity, and engaging product subject matter experts as necessary. Job Description The SE will be responsible for all technical aspects of the pre-sales process. The SE is expected to use the breadth and depth of its technical knowledge in broadcast and/ or streaming video monetization to lead customer conversations and identify opportunities using probing questions. The SE will prepare curated demos, and customer-focused proofs of concept(POCs) with clearly defined success criteria, and manage technical customer engagement for handoff to the onboarding team. The SE will prepare a technical statement of work (SOW) used by the sales team, to highlight products and services utilized in the proposed solution. The SE will take technical ownership of the opportunity, engaging subject matter experts (SMEs), open issues, and report product feature requests during the entire pre-sales process. The SE will represent Amagi at trade shows and other forums as required to discuss and demonstrate the technical capabilities of Amagi products and services. Other job responsibilities include but are not limited to technical responses to requests for proposals (RFPs), authoring blog posts, and building training/ demo collateral for internal and external enablement. Key Responsibilities: Manage pre-sales engagement across multiple customer opportunities, and related projects with the ability to prioritize work and proactively escalate risks in consultation with the manager and sales teams. Create software tools and scripts that automate manual tasks and solve customer problems or help integrate customer workflows into amagi workflows. Will build and deliver curated demos/ POCs based on customer requirements, and clearly define success criteria. Create internal cases and anticipated product feature requests based on product gap analysis. Collaborate with the product development teams on feature prioritization. Attend calls for customer emergencies and with global internal teams during non-working hours if needed. Develop technical collateral, blog posts, and training materials, highlighting Amagis products and features. Participate in trade shows and technical forums representing Amagi. Provide regular feedback to make the pre-sales engineering process more efficient and help improve the product and technical documentation. Other related duties as assigned. Requirements and Qualifications Bachelor's degree or equivalent years of relevant experience Strong scripting knowledge in any programming language. Prior media technology experience would be an added advantage. Desirable - professional certifications in public cloud technologies Desirable - Knowledge of Kubernetes. This position is open to recent graduates from Computer Science and related fields. Required Skills and Abilities Desire to learn and build a career in media technologies Solid educational background with software development experience Demonstrated ability to solve challenging problems through software Desirable to have a working knowledge of public cloud services (e.g., AWS, GCP), Linux, automation tools - IaC (e.g., Pulumi, Terraform, Cloudformation, Ansible), scripting languages (e.g., Ruby, Python), workflow - (e.g., Argo CI/CD, Gitops), containerized services - Kubernetes. Desirable to have working knowledge of sales and software engineering tools such as Salesforce, Jira, Confluence, etc. Ability to understand and accurately document complex technical customer requirements. Ability to write concise and clear technical instructions and product descriptions. Ability to clearly communicate technical concepts and product details during customer presentations and demos. Ability to multitask and time manage multiple opportunities.

column2: Company Overview: Established in the mid-1980s, the company has a distinguished history of over three decades in the industrial sector. Operating under the certification of ISO 9001:2015, they are a professionally managed organization dedicated to the distribution and supply of industrial automation and electrical products and services. Throughout their journey, they have cultivated partnerships with globally renowned companies, positioning themselves as a reliable and trusted distributor in the field. Their core focus lies in providing cutting-edge solutions to a diverse clientele, catering to various industries and processes. Market Leadership: Over the years, they have emerged as a pioneer supplier in industrial automation, particularly in the Western region of the country. Their commitment to delivering high-quality products, coupled with unparalleled customer service, has solidified their position as a market leader in their area of operation. Customer-Centric Approach: Their success is driven by a customer-centric approach, where they prioritize understanding the unique needs of each client segment. Their customer portfolio encompasses a wide range of entities, including end-users, original equipment manufacturers (OEMs), systems integrators, turnkey contractors, panel builders, and consultants. They take pride in their ability to offer personalized service and support, leveraging their extensive experience to address the specific requirements of their diverse customer base. Continuous Improvement: Their journey has been characterized by continuous improvement and adaptation to evolving market dynamics. With insights gained from decades of experience and a deep understanding of the local automation and electrical market, they have consistently upgraded their operations to better serve their customers. Expansion and Reach: In line with their commitment to customer satisfaction and market growth, they expanded their operations to new territories. Since 2015, they have extended their reach to serve customers in the state of Rajasthan, further cementing their presence in the region and reaffirming their dedication to meeting the needs of clients across geographical boundaries. column1: Procurement Specialist, Proposal pre sales, Sales manager
column2: Procurement Specialist: Job Description:  A procurement specialist is responsible for managing the purchasing process within an organization. They ensure that goods and services are acquired at the best possible price and quality to meet the organization's needs. Responsibilities: Identifying and evaluating suppliers. Negotiating contracts and terms with vendors. Managing supplier relationships. Ensuring compliance with company policies and regulations. Analyzing market trends and pricing to inform purchasing decisions. Maintaining procurement records and documentation. Collaborating with other departments to understand their procurement needs. Proposal/Pre-Sales Specialist: Job Description:  A proposal or pre-sales specialist is responsible for preparing and presenting proposals to potential clients in order to win new business for the company. They work closely with sales and marketing teams to develop compelling proposals that address client needs and highlight the company's strengths. Responsibilities: Researching and understanding client requirements. Developing customized proposals and presentations. Collaborating with subject matter experts to gather necessary information. Creating compelling content that effectively communicates the company's value proposition. Presenting proposals to clients and addressing any questions or concerns. Tracking and managing proposal activities and timelines. Providing feedback to sales and marketing teams to improve proposal strategies. Sales Manager: Job Description:  A sales manager is responsible for leading and motivating a team of sales professionals to achieve sales targets and revenue goals for the organization. They develop sales strategies, provide guidance and support to their team members, and monitor performance metrics to ensure success. Responsibilities: Setting sales targets and goals for the team. Developing and implementing sales strategies to achieve targets. Recruiting, training, and mentoring sales representatives. Monitoring sales performance and providing feedback and coaching to team members. Identifying opportunities for growth and expansion in the market. Building and maintaining relationships with key clients and stakeholders. Analyzing sales data and trends to inform decision-making. Collaborating with other departments to ensure alignment and support for sales initiatives.

column2: Primarily the Applications Engineer will assist global customers to identify / verify their requirements and specifications and will prepare competitive costings / quotations / tenders that are both technically and commercially accurate, in accordance with Company policies and procedures        The incumbent will interface with both Customers and internal stakeholders including Sales, Engineering and Design to provide support and solutions that meet the needs and expectations of Customers, strengthening relationships and positively impacting the opportunity to win orders globally for Celeros ClydeUnion Pump product line      This position will be based in Bangalore and will support the global teams                        Principle Duties and Responsibilities                        Liaises with Sales on the Customers requirements and specifications, including the scope, and timing.                              Reviews the RFP (Request for Proposal) / tender document to ensure the contractual requirements are adequately defined and determines the Company s capability to meet the specified requirements.                              Prepares and submits the techno-commercial offer to Sales as per the offer submission schedule.                              Reviews and evaluates the detailed technical specifications for packaged equipment, extracts applicable Customer requirements and translates / communicates the same to sub-contractors, sub-vendors and internal stakeholders.                              Obtains quotations for relevant bought-in equipment in accordance with the applicable Supply Chain policies and procedures.                              Performs a technical and commercial evaluation of the sub-suppliers quotations (for the major critical components / items) to ensure the quote / scope is in compliance with the Customers requirements / specifications.                              Develops and submits a detailed proposal to the Customer in accordance with the applicable Tendering Policies and Procedures (ITO - Inquiry to Order).                              Ensures the CPQ tender data and tendering front log are accurately completed and actively managed.                              Provides ongoing technical and commercial clarifications as requested by the Customer and internal stakeholders to support successful order placement.                              Provides tendering support to regional tendering and sales teams for win order strategies across the product lines to ensure all activities occur on time and with high quality from proposal receipt to handover.                            Supports with Customer visits during bid clarification / negotiation stages.                          Works as a member of the Global Tendering Team to ensure KPI s and Metrics are achieved.                        3.0          Knowledge,        Skills and Abilities                        Expert technical knowledge with API multistage Centrifugal Pump and the systems they go in.                          A strong commercial focus and negotiation skill.                        Positively establishes relationships across multiple locations and copes well with working remotely from the team and other departments.                          Responds professionally to all inquiries and remains calm and composed when under pressure.                        Is well organized, structured and methodical.                        Displays exceptional attention to detail and accuracy, even when handling multiple demands.                          Has a proven track record of meeting deadlines while maintaining high performance standards.                          Is a team player: committed, reliable, responsible, flexible, helpful, supportive, active listener/ communicator.                    4.0 Education and Experience                    B.E in Mechanical Engineering in full time/ regular course from recognized Institute and university.                          8+yrs experience as application engineer for API Pumps, preferably in multistage centrifugal pump in Product or EPC MNCs                          Experience in reviewing highly detailed specifications and writing comprehensive and accurate bids                          Essential knowledge and experience in reviewing highly detailed specifications and writing comprehensive and accurate bids                        Experience in the oil & gas / power & energy / industrial market is mandatory                      Strong knowledge of Microsoft packages including Word, Excel and PowerPoint

column2: Responsible for selling the company s products or services to and maintaining relationships with existing accounts                       Working at NTT       A Client Manager is a quota-bearing sales persona and the primary purpose of the role is to take full ownership of named client accounts, retain these clients and find new business. The Client Manager is assigned a range of development and maintenance accounts and held accountable for the performance achievement of those accounts in terms of revenue retention, profitability management, and growth.     The Client Manager will work directly with clients at a variety of levels as well as internal sales teams such as Sales Specialists and pre-sales architects and post the sale; the delivery teams. They champion the delivery teams understanding of the client s solution requirements, and initiate improvement programs ensuring that the client remains committed to our solutions which leads to more sales opportunities.     Building and developing excellent stakeholder relationships with new and existing clients, fully understanding the client and the industry in which they operate will be a core focus of this role. A substantial amount of time will be spent on client engagement and engaged selling, but also liaising with internal teams to make sure the client s needs are attended to.       Responsibilities       Client ownership and relationship builder         Take primary responsibility for the client and act as internal client owner within assigned accounts     Manage and grow relationships to drive expansion and renewals across all solutions and services     Responsible for client solution penetration and education, account monitoring and portfolio reporting, and issue resolution ownership     Lead the business conversations at C-level     Become the reliable point of contact to further strengthen relationships         Client and industry expert         Gain insights into client s most urgent business problems or business opportunities while linking how our solutions and services offerings can add client business value     Maintain a high level of the relevant industry, product, and service knowledge to have meaningful conversations and generally stay ahead of trends     Collect and analyze data to learn more about the client and the industry in which they operate         Owning the sales process         Collaboratively work with extended sales teams, especially Sales Specialists, pre-sales architects, and commercial architects to successfully position the solution and/or service and see the opportunity through to closure     Partner with internal teams to ensure the scope of work and proposals are tracked, managed, and delivered on time     Work closely with other in territory counterparts and matrix teams to achieve the shared goal of growth; yet are held accountable for own targets     Use NTT Ltd. s sales methodologies and tools such as target plans, opportunity plans and account plans to support the sales process and data-driven insights     Develop and implement an opportunity plan, to provide regular check-ins with the primary point of contact and have an established process for getting buy-in from all stakeholders     Maintain a pipeline of leads on Salesforce.com         Deal structuring         Create comprehensive client business plans and engage in complex deal negotiation to build a stable, growing pipeline of current and future business opportunities.     Engage in complex deal structuring and negotiation efforts designed to protect existing business and win new deals.     Lead business negotiations for contracts ensuring deals are risk-free and profitable     Client retention and expansion     Minimize churn and maximize retention in assigned accounts     Land, adopt, expand, renew - Identify client business needs with a view to help shape solution development by the wider pursuit teams     Actively search for expansion opportunities         Knowledge, Skills, and Attributes Required         Good knowledge of Managed Services across domains such as Networking, Collaboration, Data Centres, Security and so on     Client-centricity coupled with problem-solving     Strong business acumen and negotiation skills to craft solutions that are beneficial to NTT and the client     Ability to pro-actively and independently identify and qualify opportunities; an entrepreneurial mindset is key     Natural team player - ability to coordinate and liaise with delivery teams across multiple business areas     Quick learner to understand any new solutions that are ready to take to market     Customer value management and understanding profitability and ratios of clients     A strategic future thinker who anticipates and considers external and internal factors with the ability to develop long-term plans     Ability to ask the right questions and tell great stories and have empathy with the client s challenges. Superior communication skills are a given.         Required Experience         You will need to demonstrate an impressive track record of selling solutions and managing enterprise accounts; especially Managed Services type accounts across multiple technology domains. These typically involve selling complex solutions and services to the C-suite in large enterprise accounts.     Proof of structuring large, multi-year profitable contracts     Demonstrate the ability to build strong relationships with clients across all levels     Strong experience in networking with senior internal and external people in the specialist area of expertise     Experience in managing the entire sales process, contracting process, and legal implications of a deal         Required Qualifications and Certifications         A post-graduate type degree such as an MBA or similar would be advantageous.

column2: Role: Oil & Gas - Business Development - Assistant Manager/Associate Employment Type: Full-time - Permanent Location: Mumbai and Delhi Industry Type: OIl & Gas Functional Area: Sales / Business Development (Oil & Gas) Budget: Competitive industry standards Position Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Tender Executive to join our team. The Tender Executive will be responsible for managing all aspects of tender activities and business development initiatives. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, a strong understanding of tender processes, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment. Key Responsibilities: Manage all tender activities in a timely manner, ensuring deadlines for tender submissions are met. Review and improve drafts and proposals to enhance quality and completeness. Ensure all documentation for bid proposals is accurate, complete, and submitted on time. Develop methodologies and executive summaries to effectively convey key messages in bid proposals. Study tender documents thoroughly and prepare bid synopses highlighting essential commercial and technical features. Engage with clients during pre-bid and post-bid stages, addressing queries and concerns effectively. Collaborate with the procurement department to develop project cost estimates and support in defining material specifications and equipment characteristics. Liaise with vendors, obtain competitive offers, and participate in negotiations to ensure the best value for the company. Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, identifying and pursuing new business opportunities. Monitor various tender search systems regularly, identifying contracts of interest for bidding or market intelligence purposes. Conduct bid/no bid assessments, evaluate RFPs, determine timelines, and allocate responsibilities accordingly. Possess strong communication skills to effectively communicate with internal teams, clients, and vendors. Knowledge and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience in tender management, business development, or a similar role. Strong understanding of tender processes and e-tendering platforms. Excellent organizational and time management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively. Exceptional attention to detail and accuracy in documentation. Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite. Ability to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines. Previous experience in construction, engineering, or related industries is a plus. We invite candidates with a strong passion for business development and sales management in the Oil & Gas sector, backed by the ability to understand technical nuances and engage with a diverse client base. If you're excited about being part of a growing international venture and contributing to its success, we encourage you to apply. Our team values proactive individuals who thrive in dynamic environments and are committed to driving innovation and excellence in the energy industry To express your interest, please forward your updated CV to:  lahiri.vemula@bulkmro.com

column2: Vinton Job Notification Dated : 02.05.2024 JOB VACANCY  Civil / Mechanical Engineer - Business Development We're actively seeking a Civil / Mechanical Engineer - Business Development to join our dynamic team. We require an individual adept in business development, with a demonstrated track record of securing new projects monthly on a consistent basis. As a crucial member of our team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our projects and contributing to our continued growth. In this role, your primary responsibilities will encompass project development, team management, task coordination, budget finalization, and the consistent acquisition of new projects each month. The key to success in this position lies in your solid background in project coordination, effective management skills, technical proficiency, and the ability to cultivate strong client relationships. We value excellence in communication, presentation, project bidding, and final negotiation skills. If you are results-driven and share a genuine passion for the intricate world of architectural metalwork, we warmly welcome you to be part of our team and contribute to our journey of innovation and success. Job Specifications and Key Attributes of the Candidate 1 Age Group 28 - 40 Years 2 Gender - Male 3 Qualifications - Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field. 4 Experience - 3 to 5 years of Experience in a reputed civil/mechanical industry with expertise in Project Management  5 Salary Package - Rs.25,000/- to 33,000/- approx. per month, based on the above qualifications and proven competence  6 Position Reporting to Manager - Sales & Marketing 7 Location - South Chittoor, Ernakulam, Kochi, Near Aster Medcity. 8 Joining Time 30 days from the date of the offer letter 9 Share Resumes with experience credentials to Email :  hr@vinton.in   Whatsapp : +91- 9995432522 If you are an ambitious and detail-oriented professional with a passion for successful project delivery, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Deliverables Project Bidding : Prepare and submit competitive project bids, utilizing market research and industry knowledge to maximize project grabbing. Budget Finalization : Collaborate with the finance department to finalize project budgets, ensuring accurate cost estimates and profitability. New Project Acquisition : Proactively seek and secure new architectural metalwork projects on a monthly basis, demonstrating a consistent track record of business development. Client Relations : Cultivate and maintain strong client relationships, ensuring client satisfaction and repeat business. Communication and Presentation : Communicate effectively with both internal teams and external clients, including delivering compelling presentations and proposals. Project Development : Lead the development of architectural metalwork projects, from initial concept to final execution, ensuring they meet client requirements and quality standards. Final Negotiation : Negotiate project terms and contracts with clients to achieve mutually beneficial agreements. Team Management : Oversee a team of professionals involved in project execution, providing guidance, support, and direction to ensure projects are completed on time and within budget. Task Coordination : Efficiently coordinate tasks and resources to optimize project workflow and productivity. Skill Sets Business Development Skills : Proven ability to consistently secure new architectural metal project's Project Coordination : Solid background in coordinating complex projects from inception to completion. Management Experience : Previous experience in managing teams and resources effectively. Technical Proficiency : Strong technical knowledge related to architectural metalwork projects. Marketing: Collaborating to develop sales brochures, presentations, and flooring case studies showcasing the benefits of our concrete flooring services. Utilizing all marketing channels, such as social media, email campaigns, and website content, to reach potential clients and enhance our company's visibility. Providing valuable insights and feedback from client interactions to update marketing strategies and sales initiatives. Monitoring market trends, competitor activities, and industry trends to identify opportunities for new projects. Requirements:  Bachelors degree/ Diploma in Civil Engineering or related field.  5 years of proven experience in sales, preferably within the construction or civil engineering industry.  Fluent in Arabic and English languages.  Strong technical understanding of flooring systems.  Excellent communication, negotiation, and project management skills.  Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, target-driven environment.  A customer-centric approach and a commitment to delivering exceptional service. column2: We are seeking a dynamic and technically adept Sales Engineer to join our sales team. The Sales Engineer will be responsible for providing technical expertise to the sales process, working closely with the sales team to understand customer requirements, and delivering product demonstrations and presentations. The ideal candidate will possess a strong technical background combined with excellent communication and customer service skills. Key Responsibilities: Technical Sales Support: Collaborate with the sales team to identify customer requirements and provide appropriate technical solutions. Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to potential and existing customers. Prepare and deliver technical proposals and documentation. Customer Engagement: Serve as the primary technical resource for the sales team and customers. Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, understanding their technical needs and challenges. Provide post-sales support, including troubleshooting and resolving technical issues. Solution Design and Customization: Work with customers to design and customize solutions that meet their specific requirements. Provide input on product enhancements and new features based on customer feedback and market trends. Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate with product development and engineering teams to communicate customer requirements and feedback. Act as a liaison between the sales team and technical teams to ensure seamless communication and project execution. Training and Development: Conduct training sessions for customers and internal sales teams on product features and technical aspects. column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Technical Sales Manager . As a Technical Sales Manager, you will be responsible for driving sales growth and providing technical expertise to our customers. Your role will primarily focus on pre-sales support, product approval, and ensuring customer satisfaction. If you have a strong technical background, excellent sales skills, and a passion for building materials, this is an exciting opportunity to join our team and contribute to our companys success.       Responsibilities:         Develop and execute a sales strategy aligned with business goals, targeting potential customers and winning their business.         Provide pre-sales support by conducting product demonstrations, answering technical inquiries, and guiding customers on product selection and application.         Obtain product approvals from regulatory agencies and ensure compliance with building codes and regulations.         Develop technical documentation, including product data sheets, installation instructions, and specifications.         Conduct technical training sessions for the sales team and customers.         Provide post-sales technical support, addressing customer questions, assisting with installation and maintenance, and resolving technical issues.         Collaborate with the product development team to ensure products meet customer needs and remain competitive in the market.         Stay updated with industry trends, market dynamics, and customer requirements through market research and analysis.         Manage and mentor a team of sales representatives, providing guidance, training, and support.         Prepare regular reports on sales performance, market trends, and customer feedback.         Requirements:         Bachelors degree in engineering, construction management, architecture, or a related field.         Proven experience in technical sales, pre-sales support, and product approval within the building materials industry.         Strong knowledge of building materials, construction methods, and relevant regulations.         Excellent sales, negotiation, and communication skills.         Ability to understand customer needs, provide technical solutions, and build long-term relationships.         Proficiency in technical documentation and report writing.         Strong leadership and team management abilities.         Self-motivated, result-oriented, and able to work independently as well as in a team environment.         Preferred Qualifications:         Relevant certifications or specialized training in sales and marketing.         Previous experience in sales, marketing, or product management.         Familiarity with the Indian building materials market.

column2: As a Principal Consultant in Computer-Aided Engineering (CAE), your role involves providing high-level expertise and guidance in the field of CAE to clients and internal teams     Expertise in CAE: You should have extensive knowledge and experience in Computer-Aided Engineering, including various software tools, simulation techniques, and analysis methods     You are expected to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field and be aware of industry best practices     Client Consultation: You will work closely with clients to understand their engineering requirements and challenges     This involves assessing their needs, defining project scopes, and providing technical recommendations     You will also collaborate with clients to develop innovative solutions and strategies that leverage CAE technology to meet their goals     Project Management: As a Principal Consultant, you may be responsible for managing and overseeing multiple CAE projects simultaneously     This includes planning project timelines, allocating resources, monitoring progress, and ensuring deliverables are met within budget and time constraints     You will also provide technical leadership and guidance to project teams, reviewing their work and offering technical expertise when needed     Technical Presentations and Training: You will be involved in delivering technical presentations and training sessions to clients and internal teams     This includes explaining complex CAE concepts, demonstrating software tools, and providing training on simulation methodologies     Your goal is to educate stakeholders on the value and benefits of CAE and how it can be effectively utilized     Business Development: In this role, you may be responsible for identifying new business opportunities and contributing to the growth of the company's CAE consulting services     This involves networking, attending industry conferences, and building relationships with potential clients     You may also collaborate with the sales team to prepare proposals, develop pricing strategies, and negotiate contracts     Quality Assurance: As a senior consultant, you will ensure that the CAE projects meet quality standards and adhere to industry regulations     This involves reviewing and validating simulation results, conducting technical audits, and implementing quality control measures to improve the accuracy and reliability of the analysis     Team Collaboration: You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineers, analysts, and designers, to integrate CAE into the product development process     This may involve providing guidance on design optimization, structural analysis, fluid dynamics, thermal analysis, or other relevant areas of expertise     Your aim is to foster a collaborative environment that promotes knowledge sharing and continuous improvement

column2: Sales Development Solutioning (SDS) comprises the provision of pre-sales support / expertise to sales team in their sales efforts      Covers a specialised knowledge of technical products, services, or solutions in a single or suite of offerings      Contains delivery of in-depth presentations and demonstrations to clients and sales representatives as well as the identification of new businesses focusing on future technologies and the setting of strategies to develop new business opportunities      Comprises driving of Nokias solutions across business groups as well as positioning and selling of Nokias solutions to customers in coordination with sales and / or presales teams through a consultative selling approach      Covers engagement with external clients in defining and formulating their business strategies      Comprises understanding of customers business model and long term investment planning in order to provide customised support                      Minimum 12+ years of experience as a customer engineer (or Solution expert, technical pre-sales, etc.) in an IP focused (IP routing Ethernet switching) role or demonstrated equivalence.      Candidate must have the deep understanding, hands-on, testing and deployment of the following technologies:        IP Headers and per-hop standard forwarding behaviors      Advanced routing protocols configuration, design and implementation      OSPFv2, OSPFv3      IS-IS      MPLS (LDP and RSVP) and MPLS VPN technologies and standards      Segment Routing (MPLS and IPv6 data plane encapsulation)      BGP, including multicast, unicast and VPN families      Carrier design philosophies and conventions for routing architecture      Familiarity with applicable IETF RFCs and other standards      Ethernet switching and L2 technologies:      Standard loop avoidance mechanisms      EVPN, VXLAN, and their various implementation      Deep understanding of Telemetry, NETCONF, and Yang models (proprietary and standards)      Deep understanding of security technologies, including but not limited to IPsec, MACsec, SSL, TLS, and others      Product development interfacing:      The candidate must be able to write a Feature Request Documents describing in detail all the software and hardware requirements      Deep knowledge to challenge the Product Line Managers and Engineering Department (RD) on how all the features will be impacting the HW and SW needed.      Deep Hardware understanding, from physical ports to how each chipset behaves          Detailed hands-on to demonstrate all the features needed for specific applications      Drive all the interoperability testing across multiple vendors where Nokia is the challenger and needs to integrate with actual vendors        It would be nice if you also had:        Hands-on experience with major router vendor operating systems (SROS, IOS, JUNOS, EOS, or others), and modern router and switch hardware and OS architectures      Familiarity with merchant silicon offerings, architectures, and their uses (Broadcom, Marvell, Cavium, and others)      Understanding of Optical networking technologies is desired (SONET, OTN, and related technologies)      Must be able to quickly and easily master new technologies and evolving standards in various customer business disciplines (Residential IP, Wireless Carrier IP, Business Services IP, etc.). Must have experience working with product development requirements and IP product lifecycle issues.      Must have excellent written and verbal communication skills for internal communication. Must have excellent customer communication etiquette and presentation skills. Must be comfortable being an IP products expert within Nokia and driving other departments and sales teams toward most effectively realizing IP products revenue.          Are you passionate about solving problems    As part of our team, you will:        Acts as IP technology and solution advocate to customers and CX teams to promote ION routing solutions      Engages with account teams and end customers to assess customer requirements, defines network architectures and solutions, contributes directly to tenders /customer proposals.      Takes ownership of the technical and commercial offer building      Contributes to account strategies and directions closely cooperating with CO teams      Analyses customer and market requirements, and ensures the ION product group gets systematically updated on market demands to allow product evolution in-line the local customers/ market demands      Markets: Broadband aggregation, Carrier Ethernet, L2/L3 VPN services, IP Core routing, Security, Cloud and Datacenters, Mobile backhaul, 2G/3G/ 4G and 5G Packet Core, Software Defined Networks.

Strong verbal and written communication skills and an ability to communicate effectively at all levels both within and outside the company, with a strong emphasis on being able to effectively communicate proposals information.      Strong customer focus on both internal and external customers.      Effective decision-making skills.      Good self-discipline and an ability to meet demanding schedule requirements whilst maintaining high quality work.      Good attention to detail and accuracy in written work.      Structured approach to work with the ability to set, and work to, agreed timescales.

Additional European language capability would be a distinct advantage.

column2: The Field Applications Engineer (FAE) is a vital role requiring technical expertise to identify the right solution to help Customers architect their system using bleeding edge interconnect technology from Samtec. The FAE is an important member of the Sales team responsible for delivering Samtec Sudden Service and an overall outstanding Customer Experience.        Essential Functions/ Responsibilities:            Support the Sales team through prospecting, qualification, and product design-in efforts to drive sales growth.      Provide technical support to identify new applications and opportunities with existing and future copper and optical interconnects.      Understand Customer technical roadmaps, visa-vi industry standards and trends, to summarize and make product solution recommendations.      Work jointly with Samtec R&D, Product Engineering and Operations to resolve technical issues during and after design-in.      Assist Samtec Technical Marketing with creation and editing of product documentation and sales collateral.      Create and present in-depth training material for company internal and Customer facing engagements.        The responsibilities as defined are intended to serve as a general guideline for this position. Associates may be asked to perform additional tasks depending on strengths and capabilities        Required Experience:          Minimum of 3+ years experience in supporting Customer designs and applications, preferably in an FAE role.Technically strong      Excellent interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills.      Strong analytical and problem-solving ability.      Strong knowledge of Signal Integrity and practical application to interconnect considerations.      General understanding of system architecture, backplane and design process.      Electronics Design, IC Packaging and Fiber Optics experience is desired.      Established Customer relationships within the Central Region is desired.      Project Management experience is desired.      Preferred Residents of Bangalore only.          Preferred Education:        Bachelors or Master of Science in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.

column2: Process Design Engineering       Carry out a range of activities under the guidance of more senior colleagues to support the analysis of information, the specification of the methods, process steps, and the plant, machinery and equipment required to design and continuously improve manufacturing or materials processes and process systems.       Engineering Solutions Design       Contribute to the development of and implement feasibility testing of proposed engineering solutions to provide feedback and data to validate the design.       Engineering Standards Specification       Carry out a range of activities under the guidance of more senior colleagues to support the drafting of engineering standards and specifications and the evaluation of the effectiveness of those standards.       Engineering Inspections       Carry out inspections under the supervision of senior colleagues to evaluate the quality of engineering works and/or the integrity of existing installations or structures, and make recommendations to senior colleagues on the remedial works needed to ensure conformance with specifications and regulatory requirements.       Contract Management       Deliver required outcomes by coordinating activities of subcontractors and suppliers and acting as a primary point of contact for them while working within an established contract management plan.       Improvement/Innovation       Identify shortcomings in existing processes, systems and procedures, and use established change management programs to address them.       Request for Bid Solicitation/Proposal/Tender Response       Gather information and resources and draft and complete standardized proposals and fulfill all process requirements (in terms of deadlines, documentation, etc.) in response to bid solicitations/request for proposal/tender, to create the best chance of being awarded the contract.       Knowledge Management System       Help others get the most out of knowledge management systems by offering support and advice.       Product and Solution Development       Carry out a range of product development and engineering activities. Use established systems to analyze customer needs and define and deliver products.       Project Management       Work within an established project management plan to achieve specific goals.       Personal Capability Building       Develop own capabilities by participating in assessment and development planning activities as well as formal and informal training and coaching; gain or maintain external professional accreditation where relevant to improve performance and fulfill personal potential.     Maintain an understanding of relevant technology, external regulation, and industry best practices through ongoing education, attending conferences, and reading specialist media.               Behavioral Competencies             Manages Complexity       Makes sense of complex, high quantity, and sometimes contradictory information to effectively solve problems. For example, looks at complex issues from multiple angles; explores issues to uncover underlying issues and root causes; sees the main consequences and implications of different options.       Collaborates       Builds partnerships and works collaboratively with others to meet shared objectives. For example, finds many ways to add value to the team; probes to draw out richer input from others; is a valued resource who goes out of the way to help others.               Skills             Engineering Technology       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on how to get results using new and advanced engineering technologies.       Engineering Design       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance as needed on executing engineering designs using the appropriate methods, tools, processes and software.       Engineering Development       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance as needed on achieving engineering development targets using appropriate methods, tools, processes and software.       Business Requirements Analysis       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on analyzing the business requirements that IT solutions must meet.       Engineering Specification       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on producing technical engineering specifications and related materials.       Engineering Testing       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on testing, evaluating and improving engineering outcomes.     Project Schedule Management     Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on sequencing and scheduling tasks into a project plan.       Engineering Build       Builds engineering solutions without supervision and provides technical guidance on these solutions as needed.       Engineering Implementation       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on implementing engineering designs, evaluating outcomes and then making improvements as needed.       Engineering Technical Operations Support       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on identifying and diagnosing operational problems, then developing engineering solutions to resolve those issues.       Negotiation       Negotiates without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on how to help the organization by obtaining consensus between two or more internal or external parties who may have different interests.       Policy and Regulation       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on interpreting and applying knowledge of laws, regulations and policies in area of expertise.       Review and Reporting       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on reviewing and creating relevant, lucid and effective reports.       Risk Management       Identifies, assesses, prioritizes and manages risks without supervision and provides technical guidance when required.       Costing and Budgeting       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on costing, budgeting and finance tasks.       Commercial Acumen       Applies understanding of the business environment and objectives to develop solutions without supervision, while also providing technical assistance when necessary.       Requirements Elicitation and Facilitation       Works with full competence to lead facilitated sessions for requirements elicitation, focus groups, and user acceptance testing. Typically works without supervision and may provide technical guidance.       Health and Safety       Manages and applies safe systems of work without supervision and provides technical guidance when required.       Managing Change       Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on maintaining high performance while applying a change mindset to the planning, execution and monitoring of business activities during times of change.       Prioritizing       Works with full competence to prioritize components of a project, program, or portfolio work in context with risks, activities, stakeholders, etc. across the life of the project or program. Typically works without supervision and may provide technical guidance.       Verify Requirements       Works with full competence to create the rules for requirements and design quality, perform verification activities, and maintain quality control. Typically works without supervision and may provide technical guidance.       Writing skills       Uses clear and effective writing skills without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on expressing ideas, requesting actions and formulating plans or policies.           Education           Bachelors Degree or Equivalent Level           General Experience           Experienced practitioner able to work unsupervised (13 months to 3 years)

column2: Anu Extrusions Pvt Ltd is looking for Sales Engineers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey. As a Sales Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the sales process by bridging the gap between the technical aspects of a product or service and the business needs of potential customers. Your role will involve understanding the customer's requirements, demonstrating how the product meets those needs, and providing technical expertise and support to the sales team throughout the sales cycle. Key Responsibilities: Collaborate with the sales team to identify potential customers and opportunities for the company's products or services. Engage with prospects and customers to understand their technical requirements and challenges. Conduct product demonstrations and presentations, showcasing how the product meets the customer's specific needs and delivers value. Provide technical expertise and answer customer inquiries about product capabilities, integration, and implementation. Collaborate with the product development team to understand new features and updates and effectively communicate them to customers. Assist in preparing technical proposals, RFP/RFI responses, and other sales-related documentation. Conduct proof-of-concept (POC) and pilot projects to demonstrate the product's capabilities and suitability for the customer's use cases. Assist in evaluating and analyzing the technical aspects of customer feedback and requirements, providing insights to the product team. Keep abreast of industry trends, competitor products, and emerging technologies to maintain a competitive edge in sales discussions. Travel to customer sites, conferences, and industry events to represent the company and its products. Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to create technical content, case studies, and sales enablement materials. Participate in sales meetings, calls, and negotiations to provide technical support and address customer concerns. Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, acting as a trusted technical advisor. Coordinate with implementation and support teams to ensure a smooth handover of new customers and projects. Qualifications and Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. Proven experience (X years) as a Sales Engineer, Solution Engineer, or similar role in a technology-focused company. Strong technical background with a deep understanding of the product or service being offered. Excellent presentation and communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information in a clear and compelling manner to both technical and non-technical audiences. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to understand customer needs and provide effective solutions. Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic sales environment and manage multiple customer engagements simultaneously. Customer-focused mindset with the ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients. Familiarity with CRM tools and sales automation software for tracking and managing sales activities. Willingness to travel as required for customer visits and industry events.

column2: An Excellent career opportunity is currently available for TechnicalSales Support Specialist Gurgaon, India within UOP s Process Technology Equipment organization.      The position will be based in Gurgaon, India.    A customized training program will be developed as required for thesuccessful candidate.        Key Position Accountabilities          The Technology Specialist role will act as a Proposal Manager for Hydroprocessing technologies (which includes but not limited to Unionfining, Unicracking, UOP Co-processing, UOP FT Unicracking and associated technologies). The goal of the specialist is to significantly increase UOPs share of Hydroprocessing technology licensor selections.        The Technology Specialist will participate in setting the technical strategy for sales opportunities, develop proposal and product value propositions. In addition, the specialist will participate in voice of the customer exercises to obtain feedback on our offerings, their quality, and how well we are meeting (and understanding) customer needs; obtain and report on competitive intelligence; competitor strategies and products, market demands, and trends.    Technology Specialists are part of the Project Technology Group (aka Technical Sales) within UOPs Process Technology and Equipment business unit. The Projects Technology Group provides design concepts, optimized designs, and technical sales support to UOPs customers.        The Technology Specialist is recognized as a leader in Hydroprocessing technologies, combining a high level and broad scope of capabilities and knowledge. In addition, the individual will maintain a thorough knowledge of the entire product line, concentrating on the assigned area of focus, and become recognized internally and externally as a technology expert.        The Technology Specialist should understand and leverage knowledge of competitor s technical offering, strategic business objectives, positioning, decision making process, technical strengths and weaknesses, their position in the market and strategy; usually able to use those details to develop and articulate a differentiated solution and generate a quantified UOP value proposition relative to the next best alternative.        The Technology Specialist will participate on best practice teams and develop/improve tools for improved sales support efficiency.    The Technology Specialist will also act as the primary person to develop and generate performance Yield Estimates for Hydroprocessing technologies.        The Technology Specialist must be familiar with guarantee guidelines and exceptions process, will be able to customize guarantees to requirements of project and takes competitors positions into account.      The technology Specialist should be having sound understanding of principles relating to relevant agreements and should be able to contribute to relevant sections of agreements with minimal guidance.    Technology Specialists supplements personal capabilities with UOP/HON internal and external multi-functional resources and leverages multiple-functional insights, including NPI, to build business at customer organization effective strategies, develop compelling technical solutions and execute plans.        The Technology Specialist will drive key development projects in Hydroprocessing technology area as well as in infrastructure activities for future sustainability in terms of E6 mechanism, carbo footprint reduction etc.      Key success factors in this position include:        Ability to develop new and revamp unit yield estimates (estimated yields, estimated product properties, operating conditions, catalyst requirements, estimated catalyst losses, Product recovery etc).        Ability to develop UOP technology proposals which address customer needs and information requirements and position UOP favorably versus technical offerings from competing licensors.        Ability to interface among multi-disciplinary teams across the organization and across different office around the globe.        Ability to work with Engineering to establish appropriate Basis and Scope for a given project, facilitate the transition of projects from Sales to Engineering, and participate in project kickoff meetings.        Leads post-mortem project analysis on key wins and losses, in the respective area to ascertain reasons for win/loss and make recommendations to improve future sales efforts. Lessons learned will be fed back to Global Technology Manager and Product Manager for subsequent analysis.        Ability to create clear and concise messages; presents solutions and value propositions in the customer s and stakeholder s language while displaying what makes UOP/HON a unique partner for the business.        Strong passion for winning and ability of making faster decision would be key for this role.    Past direct experience in customer interfacing, involvement in technical proposals, understanding and implementing bankability studies to provide right value to our customers, in-depth knowledge on guarantee exception process would be preferable.        Basic candidate Qualifications:            BE or equivalent degree in chemical engineering    Total of 8+ years experience in Refining/ Petrochemical technologies including minimum 24 months experience in the technical sales or engineering field with majority in process technology (development, sales, design, operations and service).        Experience in Hydroprocessing technologies is Mandatory. Experience in Renewables technology is an added advantage.    Ability to travel 15-20% of time worldwide to custom WE VALUE      Demonstrated ability to develop and foster strong customer relationships      In-depth knowledge of Honeywell and competitor platforms, products and technologies      Experience in technical writing and preparation of proposals      Strong verbal and written communications skills      Familiarity with industry regulatory requirements and future mandates      Ability to achieve results through influence in a matrixed-team environment      Ability to communicate effectively across language and cultural barriers

column2: Job Opportunity for Freshers and Experienced for Sales/Presales/ Inside sales/Online sales, BPO/Call center professionals and US IT Recruiter/ Bench Sales Positions- Qualifications for all the below positions: -Graduates or postgraduates from any year. -Open to working night shifts. -Opportunities available for both voice and non-voice positions. Roles and Responsibilities for Sales/Presales/ Inside sales/Online sales, BPO/Call center professionals: Developing a database of key decision makers from target companies. Roles and Responsibilities for US IT Recruiter/ Bench Sales Positions- Job Responsibilities:  -Conduct online resume searches. -Align resumes with job descriptions. -Perform comprehensive phone and email screenings of potential candidates (US citizens, Green Card holders, and H1B visa holders). -Determine the interest and availability of suitable candidates, negotiate salaries, and coordinate technical interviews. If interested, please share your resume on whatsapp to  63034 33811  and also email it to   HR@DELKOSOFT.COM Join our team and kickstart your career in the dynamic field of US IT Recruitment!

column2: Micro Hydro Technic is looking for Sales / Application Engineer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Serves customers by identifying their needs and engineering adaptations of products, equipment, and services.      Identifies current and future customer service requirements by establishing personal rapport with potential and actual customers and others in a position to understand service requirements.      Provides product, service, or equipment technical and engineering information by answering questions and requests.      Establishes new accounts and services accounts by identifying potential customers and planning and organizing sales call schedule.      Prepares cost estimates by studying all related customer documents, consulting with engineers, architects, and other professional personnel.      Determines improvements by analyzing cost-benefit ratios of equipment, supplies, or service applications in customer environment and engineering or proposing changes in equipment, processes, or use of materials or services.      Gains customer acceptance by explaining or demonstrating cost reductions and operations improvements.      Submits orders by conferring with technical support staff and costing engineering changes.      Develops customers staff by providing technical information and training.      Complies with federal, state, and local legal requirements by studying existing and new legislation, and anticipating future legislation.      Prepares sales engineering reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing sales information and engineering and application trends.      Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications, establishing personal networks, and participating in professional societies.      Contributes to sales engineering effectiveness by identifying short-term and long-range issues that must be addressed, recommending options and courses of action, and implementing directives.      Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

column2: This position is responsible for technical support with our existing customers and distributors and will report to India Sales Head.                      RESPONSIBILITIES        As FAE, you will be responsible for providing technical value to our Indian customers who integrate our motor drivers, analog and digital magnetic sensors, DC/DC converters and lighting circuits.        As a partner in the sales process, you will be responsible for supporting design-in and technical closure activities, while working in close collaboration with product and system engineering teams of the relevant business units (BUs) inside Allegro.          As FAE system knowledge will be a key part of your role as you will be required to work in close collaboration with FAEs and marketing and product application teams in other territories to identify and communicate new product technical requirements based on customer feedback.          From time to time, you will also be required to provide technical product training to Allegro s sales organization and franchised distribution network.                      Strong focus to support our distributor partners.              Support our customers and distributors in their development of electronic systems.              Develop the best technical and commercial solution for a given project.              Identify potential problem areas and actively manage the solution.              Develop and maintain strong relationships with your customer base.              Assist in the development of responses to RFQs.              Provide customer feedback to Strategic Marketing and System Engineering teams to define the next generation of products                  ESSENTIAL QUALIFICATIONS              Engineering Minimum degree in electronics.              5+years of working experience at Electronic / Automotive Industries , Experience as FAE in the semiconductor industry would be an advantage.              Good communication skills by developing credibly and providing high-impact technical presentations.              Self-motivated and goal oriented.              Fluent English ,Hindi              Frequent travel in PAN India is required .

column2: T     he Field Application Engineer will be responsible for Application support in South India territory and will be based out of Bangalore.               In this position you will -                 Provide application and design support based on end application in terms of paper designs / building and testing of boards using Power Integrations products to Automotive customers               Regularly visiting Automotive customers independently or with the assigned Sales in charge                 Provide PI direct support to Key customers defined by Field sales                 Independent handling of accounts for technical support                 Update customer with latest production information and support customer with demo boards along with engineering report                 Drive the design-in activities of PI Automotive products in suitable applications           Actively manage projects together with the Sales and Marketing departments to achieve design-in targets         Test and analyze competition solution and help sales define PI value and WIN designs               Support customer projects in close co-operation with US Application and Europe Feld Application Engineer                 Contribute design ideas with engineering report for FAE date base                 Co-ordinate with sales and set priorities for design WIN and fast revenue growth                 Review weekly or bi-weekly progress of design                 Establishes design WIN objectives by creating a plan in support of regional objectives           Support our distribution partners during FAE trainings or end customer seminars               Conduct periodical training to distributor FAE team, workshops / seminars ( In-house Public )                 Travel required    25-33%.                       Requirements:                   Should have strong fundamental SMPS knowledge and its various topologies               Strong Knowledge and experience in AC/DC and DC/DC SMPS design, testing and analysis                 Knowledge of Automotive application such as battery charger and motor drive inverter will be added advantage                 Good knowledge of national and international standards (eg IPC, IEC, AECQ100, ISO26262 etc) is an advantage                 Should possess knowledge in designing magnetic components including transformers, Common Mode chokes / Inductors etc                 Able to debug designs and recommend changes                 Strong knowledge on design / simulation tools                 Able to do accurate BOM level analysis                  Able to build good working relationships with customer, distributors team and colleagues                  Contribute effectively to Sales strategies                 Strong communication skill, both verbal and in writing a must                 Presentation Skill essential                 Qualification and Experience:                    Minimum of 2 years of experience in design and development of SMPS               Bachelor Degree in Electronic with 2 years of experience or Masters fresh graduate in Electronic
