column2: This role requires a blend of technical expertise, customer service, and sales skills to effectively support potential clients and the sales team in understanding, evaluating, and adopting the companys digital products and solutions.         You are obsessed with driving continuous process improvements to optimize solution and deliverables in presales process.             How you will do it           Review opportunity inputs, requirements and specifications; should be able to capture the Digital Solution scope and understand the complete requirements of the customer.         Preparation and participation for Gate 0 calls / review meetings with JC Branch sales team for technical queries, scope clarifications, compliance and record minutes of meeting.         Understand inter-dependencies and lead cross-functional teams towards technical solutions for multi-tiered systems.         Clarify, prioritize and drive solution commitments as well as establish and maintain clear chains of accountability         Adherence to proposal & estimation process and guideline to select proper Digital Solution Applications/offering to come up with the technical solution.         Preparing technical proposals, cost estimates ensuring it meet the customer requirement and provide competitive advantage to JCI.          Provide technical leadership to coordinate, prioritize and deliver proposal, commercials in pre-sales process.         Articulate goals, desired outcomes, risks/issues and mitigation plan clearly in pre-sales process.         Clearly qualify out of the box solutions and possible customizations needed.               What we look for           8-10+ years experience as Presales engineer and delivering proposal, commercials in overall Bid process.         Expertise in building technologies e.g. BMS, VMS, ACS, Fire and Lighting         Knowledge of different types of network protocols like BACNet, LON, Modbus, OPC, and other protocols.         knowledge of HVAC or Industrial Control systems, IT-OT Integrations, API integrations         knowledge of cloud IoT platforms (MS Azure is preferred)         Familiar with Energy Management, Cloud based Analytics tools, Digital Twin, Digital asset management and BRICK schema concepts         Ability to handle multiple priorities in an energizing and fast-paced environment         Experience working with industry leaders to understand current technology trends and relevancy         Stay updated on industry trends, competitive landscape, and new product feature               Skills and Competencies:           Strong technical aptitude and ability to quickly learn new products and technologies.         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.         Proficiency in using CRM software and digital communication tools.         Ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner.         Strong problem-solving skills and customer-oriented mindset.         Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

column2: As an ROV Pilot, your primary responsibility is to operate remotely operated vehicles (ROVs) in various underwater environments. You will be tasked with performing complex maneuvers, conducting inspections, and executing tasks as directed by project managers or clients. Your role will involve both technical proficiency in operating ROV systems and effective communication with the onshore team to ensure successful completion of missions.        Key Responsibilities:          ROV Operation: Operate ROV systems in accordance with project requirements, including maneuvering, navigation, and control of manipulator arms and other tools.      Inspection and Maintenance: Conduct pre-dive checks, routine maintenance, and troubleshooting of ROV equipment to ensure optimal performance and safety.      Data Collection: Utilize onboard cameras, sensors, and other equipment to collect high-quality data during underwater operations, ensuring accuracy and completeness of information.      Communication: Maintain clear and effective communication with surface personnel, project managers, and other team members to relay operational status, report any issues, and coordinate tasks.      Safety Compliance: Adhere to safety protocols and procedures at all times, including compliance with industry regulations and company policies to ensure a safe working environment.      Documentation: Record operational data, equipment status, and mission details accurately in logs and reports for analysis and future reference.      Training and Development: Stay updated on advances in ROV technology and participate in training programs to enhance skills and knowledge related to ROV operations.
column11: Pilot, Project management, Recruitment, Line inspection

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Inside Sales Engineer to join our team in the valve industry. The Inside Sales Engineer will play a key role in driving revenue growth by supporting the sales team with technical expertise, providing product recommendations, and delivering exceptional customer service to our clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background in valves and fluid control systems, combined with excellent communication and relationship-building skills.           Qualification:           Bachelor s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, or a related field. Master s degree preferred.         Minimum of 3 years of experience in technical sales or inside sales, preferably in the valve industry or a related field. To submit quotations to the customers by the requested due dates.         To evaluate technical queries and provide proper TQ reply to customers with proper justification. column2: Job Title:  Pre-Sales / Solutions Engineer Department:  Technical   Experience:  5+ Years   Location:  Mumbai / Bangalore Job Brief: You should participate in pre-sales activities such as technical presentations, assessment of technical and business requirements and detailed system design; participates in managing and developing customer and partner relationships for long-term success and is responsible for matching Quantum products to the problem being solved by articulating their capabilities. You must be able to create reference architectures and provide architecture guidance. What youll Do: Uses in-depth product knowledge to provide technical expertise to sales staff, partners and customers through product presentations, technology/product discussions, sales presentations and/or product demonstrations. Also responsible for providing training support to staff, partners and customers if necessary. Provides effective technical presentations on all aspects of our solutions to customers and partner, including conveying the features, functions, benefits, and capabilities of our products, as well as conveying how our products interoperate with 3rd-party products. Presentations also encompass and address customer needs and Quantum differentiators in addressing those needs. Addresses prospective customers, existing customers, and the Quantum Sales Team technical questions regarding our current and future products.  Identifies and obtain customer functional and non-functional requirements in preparation for a detailed system design; including identification of all pertinent clients infrastructure such as hardware platform(s), operating system(s), application(s), network topology, workflow(s), disk storage usage and capacity requirements, etc. Functions as an active member of the Quantum Sales Team, working to create and close sales opportunities with a strong ability to overcome normal technical barriers to sales. You Must Have: Excellent written, oral and exemplary presentational skills. Ability to move Sales Opportunity through technical stages of the Sales Cycle independently.  Excellent customers connect skills and ability to understand of their buying process. Bachelors degree, preferably in Engineering, Electronics, Electronics & Communications and 5-7 years of related experience in pre-sales technical position or associated degree or equivalent with experience in a pre-sales technical position. Strong skills in Storage Technologies & Storage Area Network topologies and Storage Sizing. Storage Protocols like SAS,FC & Iscsi. Expertise in Unix/Linux Operating Systems, Compute Sizing. If this opportunity interests you, please contact me at +91 9964426695 or rajesh.kubendran@quantum-southasia.com.

column2: Onsemi is seeking a Senior MTS Analog design Engineer, NEW PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT, Power Management, to join our growing team in Bengaluru, India     This group is responsible for development of Power management products including DC-DC PMIC/POL, Multiphase controllers, Dr. MOS, AC-DC converters, LED drivers, SiC drivers, Switches and e-fuses for consumer, industrial and automotive applications       In this role, you will focus on the following        + Mentor a diverse team of experienced and junior Analog IC design engineers      + Lead an Analog IC design team with product ownership and responsibility from definition to release to manufacturing      + Make assignments for team members, providing design guidance as needed, developing schedules and monitoring progress throughout the project      + Evaluate intermediate and final results of projects during the design phase and during silicon evaluation, to ensure accomplishment of technical objectives      + Work with and provide guidance to physical designers and monitors the progress of IC layout     ?+ Work with systems engineers, application engineers and marketing to prepare product briefs, datasheets, application notes and assisting in the definition of the product to meet customer needs as well as contributing to roadmap formulation and new concept creation      + Define IP test plan and execution working along with product and test engineer     + Define and manage IP quality standard for both industrial and automotive applications      + Collaborate with validation, product engineering and test engineering teams to enable successful transfer to production      + Interface and lead discussions with the customer and/or ONsemi field sales/field applications teams to understand customer designs, problems and support as required     + Actively participate in hiring, developing and evaluating personnel to ensure efficient operation of the organization and growth of the individuals into leader      + Lead, motivate, provide training, and create career growth opportunities for the team      + Collaborate with overseas design and systems teams on technical aspects, IP development, sharing of know-how      + Provide technical leadership in driving architecture design and circuit design based on high-level specifications      + Own technical outcome of design, verification, implementation, and execution of Power Management ICs with complexities that can span from simple regulators to complex designs, control loops, and digital interfaces      + Own technical outcomes of design, verification, implementation, and execution of power management ICs with complexities that can span from simple regulators to complex mixed-signal designs and control loops      + Understand project goals, create a realistic schedule and resource plan, track execution schedule to plan, monitor progress, and provide full clarity to the team on the goals and objectives

column2: Work as ICSS (DCS/ESD) Proposal Engineer on small to medium sized proposals. Understand customer requirements ,define best suitable technical solution and deliver proposal within defined time period for small proposal independently and under minimal supervision of Proposal Lead in case of medium proposal.               ?         In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:             Execute various International Pursuits.          Analyze RFQ (Specifications) & Customer Requirements.          Prepare list of deliverables and proposal schedule.         Track proposal delivery schedule for the deliverables to meet the submission deadline.         Prepare technical queries and respond technical queries raised by customer         Participate in Technical Kick of Meeting with sales and Operation.         Preparing apt and cost effective solution and proposal based on RFQ requirements.         Cost estimation and optimization inline with RFQ requirements         Size system hardware, estimate controller loading, size control network, prepare heat and power calculations and prepare system architecture         Prepare table of compliance for various customer specifications with minimal help of Proposal lead and Operations.         Help Proposal lead in identifying Risks and Mitigation plan associated with technical solution.         Derive/Tune engineering service estimate and review with Operations.         Prepare commercial summary for the offering in customer format.         Co-ordinate with Procurement teams and if required work with vendors for Techno commercial offers for the third-party items as part of the Solution requirements.         Work closely with the Proposal lead and Sales to understand the customer requirements and prepare the proposal accordingly.       Good knowledge of ICSS, DCS, SIS, PLC, SCADA, Third party interface     Understanding of Virtualisation, Cyber security ,Asset Management systems, Area classifications.     Understanding of project life cycle from concept to commissioning.      Understanding of customer needs with the ability to define the scope boundary and translate it into a robust technical solution.      Effective presentation and communication skills.     Able to work in cross functional teams proposal, Sales, Operation, Procurement etc     Able to work in Team environment as well as independent working ability.     Able to analyze technical limitation of system and impact on solution.     Ability to recognize and respond to dynamic demands     Pragmatic approach to work and work environment     Excellent written and verbal skill     Good hands on MS Office knowledge specifically, Ms Word, Excel, Access, powerpoint, Visio etc     Can work with minimum supervision     Flexible approach to work           Quality Control & Assurance             Implementation of EEEC IMS processes/documentation as & when required throughout the project.         Adopts to WA quality requirements and Customer s regulatory guidelines         Practices and promotes First time right approach.         Strictly follows GDP (Good Documentation Practices).             Other Duties             Perform other additional specific duties, when requested by the business. These will, typically, be strategic in nature but could potentially be anything that the post holder is suitably qualified and experienced to undertake. These duties may be assigned to the person under guidance of a supervisor.             Who You Are:                You promote high visibility of shared contributions to goals       You quickly and significantly take action in constantly evolving, unexpected situations     You actively seek input from pertinent sources to make timely and well-informed decisions     You handle the risk that comes with moving forward when the outcome is not certain            For This Role, You Will Need:       Min 8 years Experience in Automation - DCS/SIS/PLC/SCADA related solutions (Oil & Gas / Petrochemical / Pharmaceutical Industry background preferred)               ?         Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:             Must be a bachelor graduate in Instrumentation, Electronics, Electronics & Telecommunication.

column2: We are looking for motivated individuals with experience in customer-facing roles and an insatiable curiosity for technology. In concert with the Customer Success/Sales Team, you will play a critical role in deciphering complex application architectures and, when possible, devising creative yet practical solutions.         ?     Responsibilities        Be a subject matter expert on Hevos Data Integration Platform and evangelize Hevo s value and features to our Customers.     Own the discovery and qualification of Hevo s technical compatibility with prospects and provide consultative guidance on technical deal strategy.     Engage, advise & address customers use cases by mapping their business goals and Hevo s product feature.     Strategically partner with Customer Success/Account Executive teams to identify customer business goals, needs, and pains.     Collaborate with Customers to ensure Proof of Concepts, Trial and Onboarding are successful.Provide technical responses to RFPs, RFIs, and Security Questionnaires.     Actively serving as a technical advisor to a portfolio of assigned accounts.     Building flawless customer onboarding experiences, customer care, ongoing engagement, consumption growth, and net revenue retention.     Develop collaboratively with our Sales, Support Engineers, and Account Managers the technical artifacts that support the organizational success of usage of Hevo.     Monitor industry news on technology products, partners, and competitors to maintain deep ecosystem expertise.     Seek ways to optimize the technical sales process and build efficiency across Sales and Customer Experience teams.     Act as the voice of the customer by translating, aggregating, and representing customer feedback to the Product and Engineering teams.               Requirements        Relevant Professional Experience. 2+ years of relevant Sales/Solutions Engineering, or Technical Account Management experience required.     Excellent communication skills. You can relate complicated concepts to non-technical people while maintaining the ability to speak credibly to highly technical people.You hear customer pains and excel at root-cause analysis in real-time.     Solution mindset. You are motivated by devising solutions to complex sets of customer requirements that lead to winning the deal.     Polished presenter. You are comfortable leading presentations and demos to large groups of both technical and non-technical audiences.     Understand the business value. You tie business problems to Hevo s technical solutions and understand technology value propositions.     Fast learner. You have a proven capacity to quickly absorb new concepts and technologies.     Thrive under pressure. You perform well under uncertainty and high impact conditions.     Experience and acumen in multiple areas of modern technology and the modern data stack. This includes SQL expertise, knowledge of cloud data warehouses, cloud provider services (AWS, Google, Azure), ETL/ELT tools, data modeling/engineering, API consumption, general networking knowledge and cloud SaaS applications (Zendesk, Salesforce, Marketo, etc )

column2: As a Quotation Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the sales and bidding process of the company     Your main responsibility will be to prepare accurate and competitive quotations for products or services based on customer requirements and company capabilities     You will work closely with the sales, engineering, and procurement teams to ensure that the quotations align with the companysstrategic goals and meet customer expectations     Your ability to analyze technical specifications, understand project scopes, and provide pricing estimates will be essential in securing new projects and contracts           Role Responsibilities:       Research target industries and identify the areas where company s offerings can be helpful to   them.         Quotation Preparation: Prepare detailed and accurate quotations for products or services, considering   factors such as materials, labor, overheads, profit margins, and other associated costs.         Technical Analysis: Collaborate with engineering teams to analyze technical specifications, drawings, and   project scopes to accurately assess the resources required for each project.         Cost Estimation: Utilize cost estimation tools and methodologies to determine the cost breakdown of each   project component, considering variables such as production processes, materials, labor rates, and   equipment.         Market Research: Stay updated on industry trends, market prices, and competitor offerings to ensure that   the companys quotations are competitive while maintaining profitability.         Collaboration: Work closely with the sales team to understand customer requirements and objectives,   ensuring that quotations align with the clients needs and expectations.         Customization: Tailor quotations to address specific client needs, highlighting value-added features and   benefits that differentiate the companys offerings.         Documentation: Maintain accurate records of all quotations, pricing details, and communication with   clients, providing a comprehensive overview of the quoting process.         Review and Approval: Collaborate with management and senior stakeholders to review and approve   quotations before submission to clients.         Continuous Improvement: Participate in process improvement initiatives to streamline the quotation   process, enhance accuracy, and improve response time.         Client Communication: Address client inquiries and clarificationsregarding quotations, providing timely and   accurate information to support the sales process.         Should have knowledge or experience in Fusion 360 and PowerMill.

column2: As a Proposal Engineer specializing in Internet of Things (IoT), you will play a crucial role in the sales and business development process     You will be responsible for understanding customer requirements, developing innovative IoT solutions, and creating compelling proposals to win new business     This role requires a deep understanding of IoT technologies, strong technical acumen, and excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and present solutions to clients           Key Responsibilities:           Customer Engagement:       Engage with customers to understand their business objectives, challenges, and requirements related to IoT solutions.     Conduct thorough needs assessments to identify opportunities where IoT can add value and solve customer pain points.     Build strong relationships with key stakeholders and act as a trusted advisor throughout the proposal process.       Solution Design:       Design and architect IoT solutions that align with customer requirements and objectives.     Collaborate with internal teams, including product management, engineering, and technical experts, to develop innovative and feasible solutions.     Conduct feasibility studies, technical assessments, and risk analyses to evaluate the viability and scalability of proposed solutions.       Proposal Development:       Develop comprehensive proposals, including technical specifications, project timelines, cost estimations, and implementation plans.     Customize proposals to address specific customer needs and showcase the unique value of the proposed IoT solution.     Craft compelling narratives and use cases to illustrate how the proposed solution will address customer challenges and deliver business benefits.       Presentation and Demonstration:       Deliver persuasive presentations and demonstrations to potential customers, showcasing the proposed IoT solutions capabilities and benefits.     Effectively communicate complex technical concepts in a clear and understandable manner.     Address customer questions, concerns, and objections, and provide expert guidance to facilitate decision-making.       Industry and Market Awareness:       Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, developments, and innovations in the IoT industry.     Continuously monitor the market landscape, competitor activities, and industry best practices to identify opportunities for differentiation and improvement.     Share insights and recommendations with internal teams to drive product enhancements and strategic initiatives.       Requirements:       Bachelors degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. A masters degree is a plus.     Proven experience as a Proposal Engineer or similar role, specifically in IoT-related projects.     Strong understanding of IoT technologies, platforms, protocols, and architectures.     Proficiency in solution design, including hardware, software, connectivity, and data management aspects.     Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.     Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a detail-oriented approach.     Experience in customer engagement and the ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders.     Familiarity with sales and business development processes.     Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams.     Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, standards, and regulations related to IoT.

column2: Self-dependence in choosing ways to achieve set targets. Nobody is going to give you the detailed plan with numerous instructions; you will get only the general direction to follow.     Pro-active attitude and ability to achieve set targets. You should have a high sense of responsibility and be self-motivated.     Other personal strengths: systematic approach, ability to work in a team efficiently, quick learner, persuasive, flexible, sociable.     Knowledge of roofing and waterproofing market of India (polymer-bitumen membranes, synthetic membranes, liquid waterproofing, construction chemistry, roofing shingles, etc.).     Experience of work as a technical specialist.     Technical or chemical education.     Willingness to travel (India).     Excellent knowledge of English (written and verbal).     Computer skills: AutoCAD on an advanced level, Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).       A. Development of new products (roofing, waterproofing, thermal insulation, sound absorption, etc.):       Define clients needs and requirements, perspective tendencies.     Analyze the materials of competitors and their properties.     Study Indian and International standards related to potential products (IS, ASTM, EN, etc.).     Study the application methods of potential products.     Get samples of competitors materials and send them to RD center.     Prepare specifications of new products for RD center and production.     Communicate new product properties between clients, RD and production.     Organize the testing and get the certifications for new products (if required).     Support new products entry to the market.       B. Work with projects and partners:       Prepare technical presentations about company products, solutions and technologies.     Hold presentations of the company, its products and solutions to engineers, architects, project institutes, applicators, governmental structures.     Communicate with the client / contractor / applicator on selected projects and get the clear and detailed requirements for the product and documentation in the approved format, analyze if current products meet the project requirements and send the requests to RD.     Proactive work with client s representatives (project managers, technical specialists, quality managers and other decision makers): get their feedbacks, describe the position of TN and product peculiarities, push TN materials and solution into the projects - not passive waiting.     Monitor the progress of the projects, coordinate changes requested by clients with RD and production.     Prepare drawings and calculations for important projects.     Perform quality control of TN-India materials application on site.     Provide the training to applicators and distributors.       C. Development of construction solutions:       Study the market, used materials and technologies.     Develop new construction solutions with TN materials and adapt existing ones (includes work with drawings) in line with market requirements.     Work with architects, engineers, testing houses, government institutes in terms of promotion of developed construction solutions.       D. Work with claims:       Meet partners, who raise claims, visit objects, where the quality of the material was questioned; gather all the important information about the claim and questioned material, get a number of good quality photos and videos, on which the problem could be clearly seen, get samples of the questioned material and send them to the factory of production.     Resolve a conflict situation with the partner by providing the explanation on place (if possible) or convincing the partner that the issue will be carefully studied in details.     Maintain the communication with the partner.        E. Other:       Provide training (with testing) and technical support to TN-India sales team.     Help with creation and adaptation of technical and marketing materials.     Organize and participate in conferences, technical seminars, expert meetings, exhibitions.     Adapt and prepare application manuals, instructions, technical datasheets and other technical documentation in line with corporate style and branding. column2: We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Sales Engineer to join our team. You will play a pivotal role in driving our sales efforts, focusing on generating leads, building relationships, and expanding our client base. The ideal candidate will have a background in the OEM industry, particularly in rubber seal manufacturing and hydraulic seal manufacturing, and possess a proven track record of sales success. Key Responsibilities Areas: 1. Develop Strategic Sales Strategy: Analyze market trends and identify growth opportunities. Develop and implement strategic plans to penetrate new markets and expand the customer base. Set targets and goals aligned with the company's sales objectives. Formulate and execute a comprehensive strategy to identify and target new prospects. This involves market research, competitor analysis, and identifying potential growth areas. 2. Generate Sales Leads: Utilize various channels, including online platforms, industry events, and networking opportunities, to generate sales leads. Conduct research to identify potential prospects and decision-makers within target companies. Collaborate with marketing teams to develop lead-generation campaigns and initiatives. Proactively generate sales leads through various channels such as networking, referrals, cold calling, and online platforms. Utilize industry-specific databases and resources to identify potential clients and opportunities. 3. Build and Maintain Client Relationships: Establish and nurture relationships with clients and prospects to understand their needs and preferences. Provide personalized assistance and solutions to address client requirements. Act as a trusted advisor to clients, offering insights and recommendations on products and services. Regularly engage with clients to understand their evolving needs and preferences. 4. Expand Professional Networks: Participate in industry events, trade shows, and conferences to expand professional networks and foster partnerships. Engage with industry associations and organizations to stay updated on industry trends and developments. Leverage existing relationships and connections to create new business opportunities. 5. Conduct Client Meetings: Arrange and conduct meetings with potential clients to assess their needs, preferences, and challenges. Present product offerings and solutions tailored to meet client requirements. Negotiate contracts and agreements in collaboration with the sales team and management. Deliver compelling sales presentations and product demonstrations to showcase the value proposition of our offerings. Highlight key features, benefits, and competitive advantages to win over clients and secure new business. 6. Team Collaboration: Collaborate closely with internal teams such as marketing, product development, and customer service to ensure seamless delivery of solutions and exceptional customer experiences. 7. Sales Reporting: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and pipeline progress using CRM software. Provide regular reports and updates to management regarding sales performance, opportunities, and challenges. Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.  Proven experience in sales, preferably in the OEM industry with a focus on rubber seals manufacturing and hydraulic seals manufacturing.  Strong negotiation and communication skills.  Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients and colleagues.  Strategic thinker with a results-oriented approach.  Ability to work independently and as part of a team.  Proficiency in ERP software and Microsoft Office suite. Join our team and be part of an innovative and forward-thinking organization. If you possess the skills and experience outlined above, we invite you to apply and become an integral sales team member. Apply now to embark on a rewarding sales career! Interested candidates shall apply to hrp@santoo.ae

column2: Job Title: Offline Sales Engineer Executive Company: Makenica.com Work Mode: Offline Field Mode   Job Description: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Offline Sales Engineer Executive to join our team in Bangalore. The ideal candidate will be responsible for leveraging their technical expertise to drive sales growth in designated regions through offline field meetings. Key Responsibilities: - Utilize knowledge of 3D printing and manufacturing to engage potential clients effectively. - Conduct a minimum of three offline meetings daily with prospects from our database. - Implement initiatives to increase conversion and velocity of our sales pipeline. - Own the entire process of identifying prospects, pursuing, and converting them into orders. - Collaborate with our Operations team to understand clients' projects and propose suitable solutions. - Develop and nurture long-term relationships with clients, providing support throughout the order execution process. - Meet regular sales targets and effectively coordinate sales projects. - Generate weekly, monthly, and quarterly sales reports to track performance and identify areas for improvement. - Focus on industries such as EV, Robotics, Medical Devices, and Drones. - Requirements: Minimum of 3 years of technology/manufacturing-related sales or business development experience. - Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills. - Demonstrated success in B2B technical sales, including acquiring new accounts and influencing C-level executives. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business Administration, or related field. - Proven track record in technology/manufacturing-related sales or business development. - Strong understanding of manufacturing processes and industry trends. - Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. - Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment. - Self-motivated with a strong drive for results. - Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software. - Ability to conduct regular offline meetings with potential clients. Join us at MAkenica.com and become part of a dynamic team driving innovation in the manufacturing industry. Apply now and unleash your potential in a challenging and rewarding environment.
